strings.evolution:
I will not be controlled.
I am the one who will take control!
strings.affinity:
I will not betray you.
I will swear...
On my dearly departed sister...
strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. As a member of the Church of Glabados, Delita joins forces with Duke Goltanna in order to pave the way for the War of the Lions. After being recognized for his successful kidnapping of Princess Ovelia, he is named commander of the Blackram Knights and earns Goltanna's trust through his dealings with the cardinal. However, this would all ultimately lead to his assassination of both Orlandeau and Goltanna as per the wishes of the church.
strings.fusion:
One should be rewarded for their efforts?
That is a lie made up by society.
strings.summon:
Is this too a rotten world in which I've but
to carry out the role I've been handed?
I am sorry but I cannot accept that.

strings.affinity:
I will not betray you.
I will swear...
On my dearly departed sister...
strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. Although Delita has been friends with Ramza since childhood, he is of common birth. Once he finally began recognizing the gap between them due to their social standing, he lost his sister Tietra to the strife involving House Beoulve. This tragedy would lead him to part ways with Ramza, and send him down a path in which nobles would no longer be able to manipulate him. Determined to realize his new ambitions, he joins the Church of Glabados and poses as a knight of the Order of the Southern Sky to kidnap Princess Ovelia from Orbonne Monastery.
strings.fusion:
The most ideal method will not necessarily
yield the most positive results.
You should remember this.
strings.summon:
I am only trying to go against this one great current.
That is all.
